# useTooltip

Returns a callback ref to show a tooltip over the target element.

## Parameters

| Param     | Type                                  | Description                              |
| --------- | ------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| text      | `string`                              | the tooltip text.                        |
| placement | `'left' / 'right' / 'top' / 'bottom'` | the tooltip placement.                   |
| aria      | `'describedby' / 'labelledby'`        | the aria attribute to set on the target. |

## Returns

`function` - callback ref.

## Example

```js
import {useTooltip} from '@bluecateng/pelagos';

const Example = () => <div ref={useTooltip('Example tooltip', 'top')}>...</div>;
```
